add_library(nicslu "")
target_sources(nicslu
               PRIVATE
               ../source/nicslu_aegraph.c
               ../source/nicslu_amd.c
               ../source/nicslu_analyze.c
               ../source/nicslu_check.c
               ../source/nicslu_cond.c
               ../source/nicslu_destroy.c
               ../source/nicslu_dumpa.c
               ../source/nicslu_dumplu.c
               ../source/nicslu_etree.c
               ../source/nicslu_flops.c
               ../source/nicslu_global.c
               ../source/nicslu_initialize.c
               ../source/nicslu_internal.c
               ../source/nicslu_kernel.c
               ../source/nicslu_kernel_fact.c
               ../source/nicslu_kernel_fact_parallel.c
               ../source/nicslu_kernel_parallel.c
               ../source/nicslu_matrix.c
               ../source/nicslu_memuse.c
               ../source/nicslu_mergedup.c
               ../source/nicslu_mc64.c
               ../source/nicslu_mc64scale.c
               ../source/nicslu_refact.c
               ../source/nicslu_refact_parallel.c
               ../source/nicslu_refine.c
               ../source/nicslu_residual.c
               ../source/nicslu_scale.c
               ../source/nicslu_scheduler.c
               ../source/nicslu_solve.c
               ../source/nicslu_sort.c
               ../source/nicslu_static_symbolic.c
               ../source/nicslu_thread.c
               ../source/nicslu_thread_proc.c
               ../source/nicslu_throughput.c
               ../source/nicslu_transpose.c

               ../source/thread.c
               ../source/timer_c.c)
